verbs.description: The noose [V: is] tightening . One of Michael Cohen ’s business partners , a Russian kingpin in the incredibly corrupt NYC taxi business , has reached a plea deal to cooperate in Cohen ’s prosecution , in exchange for a much lighter sentence than he would otherwise have received . A significant business partner of Michael D. Cohen , President Trump ’s personal lawyer , …
